summary: A simple mod that makes Faralda from the College of Winterhold marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=5][center][b]Marriageable Faralda[/b][/center][/size][/color]
A very simple mod that just makes Faralda from the College of Winterhold marriageable by request.

Faralda can now be married and is eligible for having adopted children. She cannot be a follower though due to voice limitation. Her voice is FemaleSultry.

[color=#ffff00][b]Faralda Stats[/b][/color]
Race: Altmer
Gender: Female
Class: Destruction Mage Trainer - Specializes in One-Handed, Heavy Armor, Alteration, Destruction, Restoration.
Battlefield Role: Damage
Morality: 3 (will not commit or support crime)
Location and/or home: College of Winterhold 

[b][color=#ffff00]Requirements: [/color][/b]
[i]Skyrim [/i]

[b][color=#ffff00]Known issues: [/color][/b]
No major known conflicts.
Let me know if there are any I haven't been able to test it yet - I haven't been to CoW and don't have a save.


Yes, before I see any "oh you can just do this via console commands! Derr!" comments, yes you can. This mod is just for people who want only Faralda to be marriageable without the hassle of console commands.


[center]I can take requests! If you wish to see a NPC become a follower or marriageable let me know through comments or message![/center]
author: LethalThreat
